# keySystem

**Instance Property**

The type of key system used to retrieve keys.

## Declaration

```swift
var keySystem: AVContentKeySystem { get }
```

## Discussion

Valid values for keySystem are [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVContentKeySystem/fairPlayStreaming] and [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVContentKeySystem/clearKey].

## Inspecting the session

- **AVContentKeySystem**: A key-delivery method for a content key session.
- **storageURL**: A URL that points to a writable storage directory.
